design_philosophy.identity: A high-performance, non-custodial financial terminal for the XRP Ledger.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Deep Ocean Dark Mode. Glassmorphism. Neon Blue Data Streams.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure #00AEEF text is only used on very dark backgrounds. Use #33BEF2 for smaller text if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Install Google Fonts (Rajdhani, Manrope) immediately in index.css.
2. Theme: Enforce dark mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
3. Background: Use the provided 'main_texture' URL as a subtle background for the entire app body, with a heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-950/90) to ensure text readability.
4. Wallet Page: Use a clean list view for assets with their respective logos from the assets list.
5. Swap Page: Center the swap card. Use a 'glow' effect behind the main container.
6. Dashboard: Use Recharts for the price chart. Style the lines with #00AEEF (XRP Blue).
7. Buy Page: Create distinct cards for MoonPay, Mercuryo, and Transak using a generic credit card icon if specific logos are unavailable, or use text labels.
8. Icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (Wallet, RefreshCcw, CreditCard, Settings, etc.).
9. Charts: Use 'recharts' library. Customize tooltips to be dark and minimal.
10. Connect Wallet: Modal should use the 'glass' gradient background.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use generic gradients. Use the specific XRP gradient defined in colors.
Every interactive element must have a hover state.
Use data-testid attributes for all inputs and buttons.
Keep spacing generous (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use #020817 for backgrounds.
